title: Secret Present
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Riko-san...... The yarn got tangled......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Let me take a look. Hmm...... Ah, I untangled it. All good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Alright. Let me try again.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>The more you knit, the easier it’ll be for you to untangle it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Okay. Thanks, Riko-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>No problem. Are you going to finish your present in time?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I will. I want to wear matching hats.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Oh, right! I’ll try my best to make mittens, too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I hope everyone will be pleased. Rina-chan Board says, “Excited.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Of course, they will! I can’t wait for the Christmas party. 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
